subject: Ice Skating
Speed Skating
lead_paragraph: Jenny Wolf of Germany won gold in the women’s 500 meters for the third straight year at the world speedskating championships in Richmond, British Columbia. Wolf posted a combined two-run time of 1 minute 15.75 seconds. Kang-Seok Lee of South Korea clocked 1:09.73 to win the men’s 500. skate.
